.. _`samtools idxstats`:

SAMTOOLS IDXSTATS
=================

Use samtools to retrieve and print stats form indexed bam, sam or cram files





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule samtools_idxstats:
        input:
            bam="mapped/{sample}.bam",
            idx="mapped/{sample}.bam.bai"
        output:
            "mapped/{sample}.bam.idxstats"
        log:
            "logs/samtools/idxstats/{sample}.log"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-225-gb77af9ed/bio/samtools/idxstats"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
